content: > designed after our popular men s sweater larry lawrence is a simple pullover with garter stitch texture that s cute for boys and girls berroco the men s version larry 1 skill level easy to fit chest size 23 24-25-26-27-28 finished measurements chest 25 26-27-28-29-30 length 16 16½-17½-18-19-20 note this garment was designed with approximately 2 of ease please take this into consideration when selecting your size materials berroco remix 100 g 3 3-3-4-4-4 balls #3972 fern straight knitting needles sizes 6 4 00 mm and 8 5 00 mm 1 set 4 double pointed knitting needles dpn size 6 4 00 mm 2 stitch holders 1 stitch marker gauge 17 sts and 23 row = 4 in st st on larger needles 16 sts and 32 row = 4 in garter st on larger needles construction schematics are provided 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/larry
